verses.verse: In the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gone <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, the same <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> they into the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.

For they were <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H7508>Rephidim<s%>, and were <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4057>desert<s%> of <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, and had <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>; and there <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>camped<s%> before the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto him out of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and <S%H5046>tell<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

You have <S%H7200>seen<s%> what I <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%>, and how I gave birth <S%H5375>to<s%> you on <S%H5404>eagles<s%>' <S%H3671>wings<s%>, and brought you unto <S%H935>myself<s%>.

Now <S%H8085>therefore<s%>, if you will obey my <S%H6963>voice<s%> <S%H8085>indeed<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, then you shall be a peculiar <S%H5459>treasure<s%> unto me above all <S%H5971>people<s%>: for all the earth is <S%H776>my<s%>.

And you shall be unto me a <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>. These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> which you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H7760>laid<s%> before their <S%H6440>faces<s%> all these <S%H1697>words<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> commanded <S%H6680>him<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, All that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> we will <S%H6213>do<s%>. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, behold I <S%H935>come<s%> unto you in a <S%H5645>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, that the <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8085>hear<s%> when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> with you and <S%H539>believe<s%> you for <S%H5769>ever<s%>. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> them to <S%H3117>day<s%> and to <S%H4279>morrow<s%>, and let them <S%H3526>wash<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes<s%>,

And be <S%H3559>ready<s%> against the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: for the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will come <S%H3381>down<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5971>people<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>.

And you shall set <S%H1379>bounds<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Take <S%H8104>care<s%> to <S%H5927>yourselves<s%>, that you go not up into the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, or <S%H5060>touch<s%> the <S%H7097>border<s%> of <S%H5060>it<s%>: whoever touches the <S%H2022>mount<s%> shall be <S%H4191>surely<s%> put to <S%H4191>death<s%>:

There shall not a <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> <S%H5619>it<s%>, but he shall surely be <S%H5619>stoned<s%>, <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3384>shot<s%> <S%H3384>through<s%>; whether it be <S%H929>animal<s%> <S%H518>or<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, it shall not <S%H2421>live<s%>: when the <S%H3104>trumpet<s%> sounds <S%H4900>long<s%>, they shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>; and they <S%H3526>washed<s%> their <S%H8071>clothes<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H1961>Be<s%> <S%H3559>ready<s%> against the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>: <S%H5066>come<s%> not at your <S%H802>wives<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, that there were <S%H6963>thunders<s%> and <S%H1300>lightnings<s%>, and a <S%H3515>thick<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H2389>loud<s%>; so that all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that was in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H2729>trembled<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%>; and they <S%H3320>stood<s%> at the <S%H8482>lower<s%> part of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> was altogether on a <S%H6225>smoke<s%>, <S%H6440>because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> upon it in <S%H784>fire<s%>: and the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> there <S%H5927>ascended<s%> as the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> of a <S%H3536>furnace<s%>, and the whole <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2729>quaked<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>.

And when the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> <S%H6963>sounded<s%> <S%H1980>long<s%>, and grew <S%H2390>louder<s%> and <S%H3966>louder<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%>, and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him by a <S%H6963>voice<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>: and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> up <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>; and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, Go <S%H3381>down<s%>, <S%H5749>warn<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, lest they break <S%H2040>through<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H7200>gaze<s%>, and <S%H7227>many<s%> of them <S%H5307>perish<s%>.
And let the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5066>also<s%>, which come near to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3068>themselves<s%>, lest the Lord break forth upon <S%H6555>them<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3201>cannot<s%> come <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>: for you <S%H5749>ordered<s%> <S%H559>us<s%>, saying, Set <S%H1379>bounds<s%> about the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, and sanctify <S%H6942>it<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>him<s%>, Away, get you <S%H3381>down<s%>, and you shall come <S%H5927>up<s%>, you and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> with you but let not the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> break <S%H2040>through<s%> to come <S%H5927>up<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, lest he break forth upon <S%H6555>them<s%>.
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and spoke unto <S%H559>them<s%>.
